simplesect.title: Brief Description
simplesect.para: CAN filter init structure definition.

simplesect.title: uint16_t CAN_FilterIdHigh
simplesect.para: Specifies the filter identification number (MSBs for a 32-bit configuration, first one for a 16-bit configuration). This parameter can be a value between 0x0000 and 0xFFFF
